message: Hi Bob, let's start off with a fair split. I take $60, you take $40. It's important to settle this early before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering inflation affects you more than me. Let's try 55-45.

Bob, let's be reasonable. I understand you want a good deal, but inflation is working against me. My offer from round 1 is now worth less than your offer in round 2. Let's settle this fairly before it gets worse.
I see you're feeling the pinch of inflation. I'm willing to take a bit more, considering my gain isn't affected by it. Let's try 58-42 and wrap this up.
